results.title: Turn your TV screen into a beautiful backdrop
results.excerpt: With a new backdrop option, you can customize your TV screen with your favorite photos

results.title: Why are Android OS names so sweet?
results.excerpt: Cupcake, Froyo, Jelly Bean, Lollipop... The list of Android OS releases sounds like the makings of a serious sugar high. Discover how this delicious naming convention began.

results.title: Designing the perfect Lollipop
results.excerpt: Material design: one consistent design language flexible enough to span devices across mobile, desktop, and beyond.

results.title: 5 things you didn’t know you could do with Chromecast
results.excerpt: So you know Chromecast is a great way to enjoy movies, TV shows and music on a big screen. But do you know it can do a whole lot more?

results.title: Life-proof your Nexus 9
results.excerpt: Life may be full of bumps and bruises, but your device doesn’t have to be. Whatever kind of user you are, there’s a feature or accessory to help keep you and your Nexus 9 safe.

results.title: Introducing fun family games for Chromecast.
results.excerpt: Whether you're looking forward to a quiet movie night or a rousing game night, there's something for everyone.
